title: Infiltrate Moonrise Towers
content:
refugees at the grove. You can respond with the following options:

It wasn’t even a choice. They needed my help. It doesn’t seem like my help did them much good. The cultists caught up with them. It was a waste of time. I regret it now. I didn’t do it for them. The goblins were in my way, so I killed them.

Choosing the first option will have them say it’s not a choice just anyone could make, before wincing in pain. A successful Perception check will tell you that they’re hiding their struggle
